attributes.action: Deploy UK armed forces to defend UK streets against severe riots.
attributes.additional_details:
During times of severe non riots or non peaceful disturbance the UK armed forces should be deployed to aid in the speedy restoration of peace and order.

The armed forces should use peaceful and where needed measured force to defend the rights, lively hoods and safety of citizens. The forces should be on call after at least 24 hours of riots or when the safety of the public is at severe risk.
